thread.title: Scorpions out of playoff hunt after draw
thread.title_full: Scorpions out of playoff hunt after draw - San Antonio Express-News

author: Staff Report
title: Scorpions out of playoff hunt after draw
text:
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. â€” The Scorpions were eliminated from postseason contention after playing to a scoreless draw Wednesday night against the Fort Lauderdale Strikers .
The defending champion Scorpions (7-8-13, 29 points) entered the match needing to win their final three contests and receive a lot of outside help to reach the NASL playoffs.
The Strikers (10-8-10, 38 points), meanwhile, remained two points ahead of Tampa Bay in the hunt for the fourth and final postseason berth.
